mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.asn_no AS "asnNo", a.sku_code AS "skuCode", a.serial_no AS "serialNo", a.status AS "status", a.rcv_line_no AS "rcvLineNo", a.owner_code AS "ownerCode", a.lot_num AS "lotNum", a.data_source AS "dataSource", a.scan_op AS "scanOp", a.scan_time AS "scanTime", a.rec_ver AS "recVer", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.org_id AS "orgId", a.head_id AS "headId"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO wm_asn_serial( id, asn_no, sku_code, serial_no, status, rcv_line_no, owner_code, lot_num, data_source, scan_op, scan_time, rec_ver, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag, org_id, head_id ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{asnNo}, #{skuCode}, #{serialNo}, #{status}, #{rcvLineNo}, #{ownerCode}, #{lotNum}, #{dataSource}, #{scanOp}, #{scanTime}, #{recVer}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{orgId}, #{headId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE wm_asn_serial SET asn_no = #{asnNo}, sku_code = #{skuCode}, serial_no = #{serialNo}, status = #{status}, rcv_line_no = #{rcvLineNo}, owner_code = #{ownerCode}, lot_num = #{lotNum}, data_source = #{dataSource}, scan_op = #{scanOp}, scan_time = #{scanTime}, rec_ver = #{recVer} + 1, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, org_id = #{orgId}, head_id = #{headId} WHERE id = #{id} AND rec_ver = #{recVer}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM wm_asn_serial WHERE asn_no = #{asnNo} AND org_id = #{orgId}
